fieldHint.hint2: Ex: author, funnel hacker, realtor, for sale by owner, etc.
Ex: authors, funnel hackers, realtors, for sale by owners, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is your main topic? (2-3 words)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: ebook marketing, funnel hacking, real estate marketing, for sale by owner, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is your target audience's #1 Desire at the present time? (VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: sell more books, make more sales, sell more houses, sell your house, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is your target audience's #1 Desire in the future? (VERB end in ING)

fieldHint.hint1: "My target audience sees themselves _____." (VERB ending in ING)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: selling more books, making more sales, selling more houses, selling your house, etc

fields.fieldTitle: What is your target audience's #1 Desire phrased in the PAST tense? (Like it already happened)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: sold more books, made more sales, sold more houses, sold your house, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Who is your target audience's #1 ENEMY? (person)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: publisher, competitor, fsbo, realtor, etc.
